channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for WA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for WA

item.title: Report X-2024030577
item.description:
Report X-2024030577

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-15T15:11:11+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-08
  • City: SEATTLE
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER ARRIVED AT WORK TO SEE A PACKAGE IN A SPILL TUB ON THE RESPONDER DESK. LOOKING AT THE PACKAGE RESPONDER NOTICED THE DIAMOND HAZARD LABEL. DONNING PPE RESPONDER THEN PROCESSED THE LEAKING PACKAGE.

item.title: Report X-2024030116
item.description:
Report X-2024030116

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-11T15:13:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-01
  • City: REDMOND
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER WAS CALLED TO DOOR. THE RESPONDER USED THE DECISION TREE AND RESPOND SHEETS TO CLEAN THE AREA. THE RESPONDER THEN MOVE THE PACKAGE AND DEBRIS TO THE PSC TO FINNISH PROCESSING.

item.title: Report X-2024030272
item.description:
Report X-2024030272

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-15T15:11:11+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-28
  • City: BURLINGTON
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was unloaded from trailer then brought to QA when it was noticed box was damp, box was placed in red hazmat tote DescribePack: Cap is loose causing liquid to spill from top DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed in red hazmat tote and isolated from other boxes to reduce spillage

item.title: Report E-2024030139
item.description:
Report E-2024030139

  • City: TACOMA
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: KAG LEASING, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: The KAG Energy, LLC driver overfilled the storage tank resulting in approximately 10 gallons of diesel fuel being released. Graymar Environmental responded to the scene and handled the remediation.
